title: $:/plugins/benwebber/input
name: input
description: Macros to render special input field types
author: Ben Webber
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/benwebber/input/README":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/input/README","text":"''input'' adds new macros to render special `<input>` field types.

<$list filter="[variables[]match[twdoc.list-macros]]" emptyMessage="Install [ext[twdoc|https://benwebber.github.io/tiddlywiki-plugins/#twdoc]] to view documentation.">
<<twdoc.list-macros "[all[shadows]tag[$:/tags/Macro]prefix[$:/plugins/benwebber/input/]]">>
</$list>
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/input/macros/private":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/input/macros/private","text":"\define input.date.inputActions()
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<inputDateTiddler>> $field=<<inputDateField>> $value={{{[<inputDateStateTiddler>get[text]search-replace:g[-],[]]}}} $timestamp=<<inputDateTimestamp>> />
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<inputDateStateTiddler>> />
\end

\define input.date.format() [UTC]YYYY-0MM-0DD
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/input/macros/public/date":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/input/macros/public/date","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","twdoc.description":"Render an ''edit-text'' widget with `<input type="date">` to edit a date field.","twdoc.param.tiddler":"Title of the tiddler to modify. The default is the <<twdoc.ext "Current Tiddler" "current tiddler">>.","twdoc.param.field":"Field to modify.","twdoc.param.timestamp":"Whether to modify the tiddler's ''modified'' and/or ''created'' fields. Can be `yes` or `no`.","twdoc.param.attrs":"Widget attributes to pass to the ''edit-text'' widget, as in `"""disabled=yes"""`.","twdoc.param.attrs.optional":"true","text":"\define input.date(tiddler, field: "date", timestamp: "yes", attrs)
\import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/input/macros/private]]
<$let
  inputDateTiddler={{{ [<__tiddler__>!is[blank]else<currentTiddler>] }}}
  inputDateField=<<__field__>>
  inputDateStateTiddler={{{ [<inputDateTiddler>] [<inputDateField>] +[join[/]addprefix[$:/temp/plugins/benwebber/input/]] }}}
  inputDateDefault={{{ [<inputDateTiddler>get<inputDateField>format:date<input.date.format>] }}}
  inputDateTimestamp=<<__timestamp__>>
>
<$edit-text
  tiddler=<<inputDateStateTiddler>>
  default=<<inputDateDefault>>
  tag=input
  type=date
  inputActions=<<input.date.inputActions>>
  $attrs$
/>
</$let>
\end
"}}}
